text: melum avarkal, "intak kal nataikalin vayirril irukkum kuttikal enkal ankalukku mattume contam. Avai enkal penkalukkut tatukkappattullana - avai cettup pirantal, avarril avarkalukkum panku untu" enrum kurukirarkal; avarkalutaiya (intap poyyana) kurrukku avan takka kuli kotuppan - niccayamaka avan purana nanamutaiyonum, (yavarraiyum) anintavanumaka irukkinran
